enWisdom: The worst of morals is adorning oneself with vices
By keeping away from depravities, you are saved from disgrace

Wisdom: لَا تَغْنَ [لَا تَعْتَنِ‏] بِالرَّذَائِلِ فَتَسْقُطَ قِيمَتُكَ
enWisdom: Do not make yourself needless through depravities such that your value is dropped
He who delights in depravities will never succeed

Wisdom: لَا مَرْحَباً بِوُجُوهٍ لَا تُرَى إِلَّا عِنْدَ كُلِّ سُوءٍ
enWisdom: Unwelcome are the faces that are not seen except in every evil situation
